It\'s useless because I posted that the forums were undergoing maintenance and archive on the 18th, 5 days ago. If you can\'t look around the forums and read updates, say the stuff that goes in Announcements, that\'s not my fault. Also, it\'s pretty easy to find posts, eve now, that explain why updating isn\'t working. So when it was posted, asking what happened when you had 5 days of advanced warning, is, in fact, a useless post.
